body:
> In what sense?

Concretizer can't resolve the fact that indirect dependency `mesa` requires `binutils` with `~plugins` due to variant defaults while the other indirect dependency `llvm` requires `+plugins`

_Originally posted by @Sinan81 in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/23003#issuecomment-822048045_
title: mesa build error with binutils~plugins
